price: Hakika wabadhirifu ni ndugu wa Mashet'ani. Na Shet'ani ni mwenye kumkufuru Mola wake Mlezi.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُبَذِّرِينَ كَانُوٓاْ إِخۡوَٰنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِرَبِّهِۦ كَفُورٗا
footnotes: Kwani wabadhirifu (watumiaji ovyo) wenzao ni Mashetani, wanapokea minong'ono yao wanapo wachochea wafanye ufisadi na watumie kwa uharibifu. Na ni mtindo wa Shetani daima kukufuru neema ya Mola wake Mlezi. Na sahibu yake ni hali kadhaalika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna al-mubadhirīna kānū ikh'wāna al-shayāṭīni wakāna al-shayṭānu lirabbihi kafūran
